alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:50PM EDT until June 14 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OCEAN COUNTY... At 450 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brick Township, or near Toms River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Point Pleasant Beach, Mantoloking, Leisure Village, Brick Township, Dover Beaches North, Pleasant Plains, Leisure Village East, Ramtown, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park, Point Pleasant, Brielle and Bay Head. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 84 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
